head.title: Of Money, and Other Economic Essays

div.p: The text of this eBook is from:

The entire original text of Hume's volumes may be seen at the website www.davidhume.org, from which this eBook was derived. Terms of that website require that the content of this eBook not be used for commercial purposes, only for personal and educational purposes. The full terms of use are published on www.davidhume.org.

The cover image is a faithful reproduction of an oil painting by Allan Ramsay (1713-1784) at:
http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Allan_Ramsay_-_David_Hume,_1711_-_1776._Historian_and_philosopher_-_Google_Art_Project.jpg.
